title: I Did Not Get My Promo Helper Free Win!
body: Just got back into Bronze III series, and won one game should have put me into Bronze II. However, I didn't get my free win...

replies.body: It actually looks like this was the first time you had entered into promos for Bronze II. You only get promo helper if you lose your promos then make it back shortly after.
Damn this sucks I just had to win twice now I'm at 0 points, and now ill never get my free win worth?
